35 namespace cinder { namespace audio {
36 
37 template<typename,typename> class LoaderSourceCallback;
38 
39 template<typename T, typename U>
40 class Callback : public Source {
41  public:
42  typedef void (T::*CallbackFunction)( uint64_t inSampleOffset, uint32_t inSampleCount, BufferT<U> *ioBuffer );
43 
44  virtual ~Callback();
45 
46  LoaderRef createLoader( Target *target ) { return LoaderSourceCallback<T,U>::createRef( this, target ); }
47  double getDuration() const { return 100.0; } //TODO: support for endless sources
48 
49  private:
50  Callback( T* callbackObj, CallbackFunction callbackFn, bool ownCallbackObj, uint32_t aSampleRate, uint16_t aChannelCount );
51 
52  void getData( uint64_t inSampleOffset, uint32_t ioSampleCount, BufferGeneric *ioBuffer );
53 
54  T* mCallbackObj;
55  CallbackFunction mCallbackFn;
56  bool mOwnsCallbackObj;
57 
58  friend class LoaderSourceCallback<T,U>;
59  template <typename T2, typename U2>
60  friend std::shared_ptr<Callback<T2,U2> > createCallback( T2* callbackObj, void (T2::*callbackFn)( uint64_t inSampleOffset, uint32_t inSampleCount, BufferT<U2> *ioBuffer ), bool ownCallbackObj, uint32_t aSampleRate, uint16_t aChannelCount );
61 };
62 
63 template<typename T, typename U>
64 std::shared_ptr<Callback<T,U> > createCallback( T* callbackObj, void (T::*callbackFn)( uint64_t inSampleOffset, uint32_t inSampleCount, BufferT<U> *ioBuffer ), bool ownCallbackObj = false, uint32_t aSampleRate = 44100, uint16_t aChannelCount = 2 )
65 {
66  return std::shared_ptr<Callback<T,U> >( new Callback<T,U>( callbackObj, callbackFn, ownCallbackObj, aSampleRate, aChannelCount ) );
67 }
68 
69 template<typename T, typename U>
70 class LoaderSourceCallback : public Loader {
71  public:
72  static LoaderRef createRef( Callback<T,U> *source, Target *target )
73  {
74  return std::shared_ptr<LoaderSourceCallback<T,U> >( new LoaderSourceCallback<T,U>( source, target ) );
75  }
76 
77  ~LoaderSourceCallback() {}
78 
79  uint64_t getSampleOffset() const { return mSampleOffset; }
80  void setSampleOffset( uint64_t anOffset ) { mSampleOffset = anOffset; }
81  void loadData( BufferList *ioData );
82  private:
83  LoaderSourceCallback( Callback<T,U> *source, Target *target );
84  Callback<T,U> * mSource;
85  uint64_t mSampleOffset;
86 
87 #if defined(CINDER_COCOA)
88  static void dataInputCallback( Loader* aLoader, uint32_t *ioSampleCount, BufferList *ioData, AudioStreamPacketDescription * packetDescriptions );
89  std::shared_ptr<CocoaCaConverter> mConverter;
90 #endif
91 };
92 
93 template<typename T, typename U>
94 Callback<T,U>::Callback( T* callbackObj, CallbackFunction callbackFn, bool ownCallbackObj, uint32_t aSampleRate, uint16_t aChannelCount )
95  : Source(), mCallbackFn( callbackFn ), mCallbackObj( callbackObj ), mOwnsCallbackObj( ownCallbackObj )
96 {
97  mIsPcm = true;
98  mSampleRate = aSampleRate;
99  mChannelCount = aChannelCount;
100  mIsInterleaved = true;
101  mIsBigEndian = false;
102 
103  if( boost::is_same<U,uint8_t>::value ) {
104  mDataType = Io::UINT8;
105  mBitsPerSample = 8;
106  } else if( boost::is_same<U,int8_t>::value ) {
107  mDataType = Io::INT8;
108  mBitsPerSample = 8;
109  } else if( boost::is_same<U,uint16_t>::value ) {
110  mDataType = Io::UINT16;
111  mBitsPerSample = 16;
112  } else if( boost::is_same<U,int16_t>::value ) {
113  mDataType = Io::INT16;
114  mBitsPerSample = 16;
115  } else if( boost::is_same<U,uint32_t>::value ) {
116  mDataType = Io::UINT32;
117  mBitsPerSample = 32;
118  } else if( boost::is_same<U,int32_t>::value ) {
119  mDataType = Io::UINT32;
120  mBitsPerSample = 32;
121  } else if( boost::is_same<U,float>::value ) {
122  mDataType = Io::FLOAT32;
123  mBitsPerSample = 32;
124  } else {
125  throw IoExceptionUnsupportedDataType(); //This callback seems to be providing an unsupprted type of data
126  }
127 
128  mBlockAlign = ( mBitsPerSample / 8 ) * mChannelCount;
129 }
130 
131 template<typename T, typename U>
132 Callback<T,U>::~Callback()
133 {
134  if( mOwnsCallbackObj ) {
135  delete mCallbackObj;
136  }
137 }
138 
139 template<typename T, typename U>
140 void Callback<T,U>::getData( uint64_t inSampleOffset, uint32_t ioSampleCount, BufferGeneric *ioBuffer )
141 {
142  BufferT<U> typedBuffer;
143  typedBuffer.mNumberChannels = ioBuffer->mNumberChannels;
144  typedBuffer.mDataByteSize = ioBuffer->mDataByteSize;
145  typedBuffer.mData = reinterpret_cast<U*>( ioBuffer->mData );
146 
147  ( mCallbackObj->*mCallbackFn )( inSampleOffset, ioSampleCount, &typedBuffer );
148 
149  ioBuffer->mNumberChannels = typedBuffer.mNumberChannels;
150  ioBuffer->mDataByteSize = typedBuffer.mDataByteSize;
151  ioBuffer->mData = reinterpret_cast<void*>( typedBuffer.mData );
152 }
153 
154 template<typename T, typename U>
155 LoaderSourceCallback<T,U>::LoaderSourceCallback( Callback<T,U> *source, Target *target )
156  : mSource( source ), mSampleOffset( 0 )
157 {
158 #if defined( CINDER_COCOA )
159  AudioStreamBasicDescription sourceDescription;
160 
161  sourceDescription.mFormatID = kAudioFormatLinearPCM; //kAudioFormatLinearPCM;
162  sourceDescription.mFormatFlags = CalculateLPCMFlags( mSource->getBitsPerSample(), mSource->getBlockAlign() * 8, mSource->isFloat(), mSource->isBigEndian(), ( ! mSource->isInterleaved() ) /*is non interleaved*/ );
163  sourceDescription.mSampleRate = source->getSampleRate();
164  sourceDescription.mBytesPerPacket = ( mSource->getBlockAlign() ); //( mSource->getBitsPerSample() * mSource->getChannelCount() ) / 8;
165  sourceDescription.mFramesPerPacket = 1;
166  sourceDescription.mBytesPerFrame = ( mSource->getBlockAlign() );//( mSource->getBitsPerSample() * mSource->getChannelCount() ) / 8;
167  sourceDescription.mChannelsPerFrame = source->getChannelCount();
168  sourceDescription.mBitsPerChannel = source->getBitsPerSample();
169 
170  AudioStreamBasicDescription targetDescription;
171 
172  if( ! target->isPcm() ) {
173  throw IoExceptionUnsupportedDataFormat();
174  }
175 
176  targetDescription.mFormatID = kAudioFormatLinearPCM; //target->mNativeFormatId;
177  targetDescription.mFormatFlags = CalculateLPCMFlags( target->getBitsPerSample(), target->getBlockAlign() * 8, target->isFloat(), target->isBigEndian(), ( ! target->isInterleaved() ) ); //target->mNativeFormatFlags
178  targetDescription.mSampleRate = target->getSampleRate();
179  targetDescription.mBytesPerPacket = target->getBlockAlign(); //target->mBytesPerPacket;
180  targetDescription.mFramesPerPacket = 1; //target->mFramesPerPacket;
181  targetDescription.mBytesPerFrame = ( target->getBlockAlign() ); //target->mBytesPerFrame;
182  targetDescription.mChannelsPerFrame = target->getChannelCount();
183  targetDescription.mBitsPerChannel = target->getBitsPerSample();
184 
185  mConverter = std::shared_ptr<CocoaCaConverter>( new CocoaCaConverter( this, &LoaderSourceCallback<T,U>::dataInputCallback, sourceDescription, targetDescription, mSource->getBlockAlign() ) );
186 #endif
187 }
188 
189 template<typename T, typename U>
190 void LoaderSourceCallback<T,U>::loadData( BufferList *ioData ) {
191 #if defined( CINDER_COCOA )
192  mConverter->loadData( ioData );
193  mSampleOffset += ioData->mBuffers[0].mSampleCount;
194 #elif defined( CINDER_MSW )
195  mSource->getData( mSampleOffset, ioData->mBuffers[0].mSampleCount, &ioData->mBuffers[0] );
196  mSampleOffset += ioData->mBuffers[0].mSampleCount;
197 #endif
198 }
199 
200 #if defined( CINDER_COCOA )
201 template<typename T, typename U>
202 void LoaderSourceCallback<T,U>::dataInputCallback( Loader* aLoader, uint32_t *ioSampleCount, BufferList *ioData, AudioStreamPacketDescription * packetDescriptions ) {
203  LoaderSourceCallback * theLoader = dynamic_cast<LoaderSourceCallback *>( aLoader );
204  Callback<T,U> * theSource = theLoader->mSource;
205  theSource->getData( theLoader->mSampleOffset, *ioSampleCount, &ioData->mBuffers[0] );
206 }
207 #endif
208
